remoteScript.content:
set -x

mkdir -p /etc/mysql
cd /etc/mysql

wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-common-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-client-plugins-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-libs-compat-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-libs-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-client-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-icu-data-files-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-devel-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-8.4/mysql-community-server-8.4.4-1.el7.x86_64.rpm

yum install -y *.rpm

systemctl enable mysqld

systemctl start mysqld

sleep 10

words=($(grep 'temporary password' /var/log/mysqld.log))

temporary_password="${words[${#words[@]}-1]}"

echo "output(TemporaryPassword=$temporary_password)"

set -x

mkdir -p /etc/stratocloud/mysql_backup

cp -r /var/lib/mysql/* /etc/stratocloud/mysql_backup/
rm -f /etc/mysql/*

systemctl stop mysqld
yum remove -y mysql-*

rm -f /var/log/mysqqld.log
rm -rf /var/lib/mysql

if systemctl is-active --quiet mysqld; then
    echo "output(serviceState=STARTED)"
else
    echo "output(serviceState=STOPPED)"
fi
